tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.p1: By creating an account, accessing, or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.
tos.p2_1: StreamLearn is a language learning platform that helps users learn English by generating customized lessons based on current news articles. The Service uses third-party APIs, including the Gemini API and Bright Data SERP API, to find articles and generate lesson content.
tos.p2_2: We offer a free tier with limited usage (e.g., a limited number of lessons per month) and a paid "StreamLearn Pro" subscription plan with expanded features.
tos.p3: To use most features of the Service, you must register for an account by authenticating with Google Sign-In. You agree to:
tos.p3_li1: Be solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
tos.p3_li2: Notify us immediately at support@streamlearn.xyz of any unauthorized use of your account.
tos.p4_1: Billing: We use a third-party payment processor (Stripe) to bill you for subscription plans. The processing of payments is subject to the terms and conditions of Stripe. We do not store your credit card information.
tos.p4_2: Recurring Charges: By purchasing a subscription, you authorize us to charge your payment method on a recurring (e.g., monthly) basis, at the rate then in effect, until you cancel.
tos.p4_3: Cancellation: You may cancel your subscription at any time through the "Manage Billing" portal on your dashboard. Cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing cycle.
tos.p5: You retain all rights to the content you create or store in the Service, such as your saved lesson history and personal word bank. You grant us a limited, non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, store, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing and improving the Service *to you*.
tos.p6: The Service generates lessons based on content from third-party news websites. We are not responsible for the accuracy, legality, or content of these external sites or the articles sourced from them. Your access and use of such third-party content is at your own risk.
tos.p7: You are free to stop using the Service at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at our discretion, without notice, if you breach these Terms.
tos.p8: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS." TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.
tos.p9: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page. Your continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
tos.p10: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@streamlearn.xyz.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how StreamLearn ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and shares your information when you use our Service.
privacy.p1_li1: Account Information: When you sign up using Google Sign-In, we receive your name, email address, and profile picture as provided by Google.
privacy.p1_li2: User Content: We collect and store the information you create within the app, including your saved lessons, your personal word bank, and your chosen topics of interest.
privacy.p1_li3: Payment Information: We do not collect or store your payment card details. Our third-party payment processor, Stripe, handles all payment transactions. We only store your Stripe Customer ID and your subscription status (e.g., "active", "free").
privacy.p2: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.p2_li1: To provide, maintain, and improve the Service.
privacy.p2_li2: To personalize your learning experience by saving your lessons and word bank.
privacy.p2_li3: To process your subscription payments via Stripe.
privacy.p2_li4: To communicate with you, such as responding to support requests sent to support@streamlearn.xyz.
privacy.p3: We do not sell your personal information. We share information only in the following limited circumstances:
privacy.p3_li1_1: Google: For authentication (Google Sign-In) and data storage (Google Cloud Firestore).
privacy.p3_li1_2: Stripe: To process subscription payments and manage billing.
privacy.p3_li1_3: Google (Gemini API): Prompts you generate (like lesson requests, topics, and activity answers) are sent to the Gemini API to generate responses.
privacy.p3_li1_4: Bright Data: Your search topics are sent to the Bright Data SERP API to find news articles.
privacy.p3_li1_5: Google Cloud TTS: Text you select for text-to-speech is sent to Google's API to generate audio.
privacy.p3_li2: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
privacy.p4: Your personal data (account info, lesson history, word bank) is stored using Google Cloud Firestore, a service operated by Google. We take reasonable measures to protect your information, but no security system is impenetrable.
privacy.p5: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your data. To make such a request, please contact us at support@streamlearn.xyz.
privacy.p6: The Service is not intended for or directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.p7: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
privacy.p8: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@streamlearn.xyz.
